document.docAuthor: Fiaboe, Komi K. M., Gondim, Manoel G. C., De, Gilberto J. & O, Callistus K. P.
document.masterDocTitle: Surveys for natural enemies of the tomato red spider mite Tetranychus evansi (Acari: Tetranychidae) in northeastern and southeastern Brazil
